EmailTemplate.subject: Expanding Medicare and Medicaid offerings with virtual care
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
For every step of the healthcare journey: Serving the most vulnerable members Virtual care is accelerating across all populations, providing real value for some of the most vulnerable, including Medicare and Medicaid populations. Our virtual care solutions can help these groups better manage their health and reduce health inequities by expanding access, improving clinical outcomes and reducing the total cost of care. In 2020, two out of three Teladoc Health general medical visits by those with Medicaid or Medicare coverage replaced visits to an urgent care or retail clinic—resulting in greater cost savings for health plans.1 Read our white paper to learn how we're supporting health plans and the people they serve by closing gaps in care and improving quality measures, including Star Ratings.
Read more <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/white-paper/virtual-care-for-medicare-advantage/?utm_source=marketing&utm_medium=email&utm_content=health-plan&utm_campaign=2022fy-hp-oth-em-health-plan-nurture]]>
1Based on member responses to questions asked during the Teladoc “Request a visit” process.
